name: Slipsilk Skinny Scrunchies - 3 pack
about: What it is:A set of three award-winning slip scrunchies designed to be anti-crease, anti-breakage to upgrade your hair tie game..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.Key Benefits:- Anti-crease, anti-breakage.What Else You Need to Know:The slipsilk difference: Traditional hair ties can tug on delicate hair which can lead to damage and breakage. Slip scrunchies are made with slipsilk, the same silk used in the award-winning slip pure silk pillowcase..This Set Contains:- 3 x Slipsilk hair ties in lilac rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They're nice. Don't pull my hair, and are very soft and cute. However I'm certain they will stretch. I don't wear them tightly but they feel stretched after one wear. Hope for better considering the steep price. Sigh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these from the actual company and every single one of them stretch out to the point you cant even use them. The company sent me another box and the same thing happened with those. Iv tried washing thwashing them in my washing machine, drying them using high heat to shrink them back nothing works. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are great! I have used every day since my purchase. I have thick hair that gets pulled by those tiny hair bands so these are lovely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They stretch out REALLY quickly, even if you dont use them super tight. I didnt with the nude colour one as I thought maybe I overdid it when using the leopard and it made no difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best hair scrunchies Ive ever used. Love that it holds my hair up in a ponytail. Definitely adding as a stocking stuffer this Xmas!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love using these hairties! only downfall is that they stretch out quite a bit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, I couldnt believe I was going to spend $30 on hair ties but as I am going through postpartum hair loss these have been great. They dont snag and they dont fall out, love the neutral colours.

reviews.review_title: Exceeded my expectations and perfect for sleeping!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These scrunchies are amazing for sleeping in because theyre thin. They feel luxurious and hold the hair well with a few twists, without stretching out of tugging on the hair. I wasnt sure what to expect when I picked them up, but they have quickly become my favorite!

reviews.review_title: great hair ties that don't cause headaches
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these hair ties, I buy them every time I go to sephora. I get headaches from regular hair ties and I find they rip out my hair whereas these are so much nicer on the hair. My only complaint is that they stretch out to quickly for the price you pay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good length that is suitable for a wide variety of hair types, but the silk does not differ much from a regular elastic hair tie. My hair still gets caught in it and pulled out by it. Although aesthetically pleasing, not worth the price for 3 charities

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Quality is very good very comfortable and carry hair very soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These hair elastics are great and I do love them, I have bought two of the mini pack with the black, cheetah print, and pink-ish ones and then the other mini pack.  I love the way they make my hair feel as they dont tug on it or cause my hair to get knotty my only complaint is they stretch out so much after a short amount of timeu2026 for the price Id wish they would hold their shape better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love these! I wasnt sure how well they would work because I am black with natural hair, but it works perfect and I feel its been a factor in my hair growth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: They are beautiful and dont pull Hair however they stretch out pretty quickly and become unusable. For the price they need to do better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this three pack as well as another 4 pack from a different store.  Both packs the small size. This pack feels different, pulls out hair and doesnt have the little slip tag on any of them.  I dont think these ones are authentic. They just arent the same and not worth the $$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using these for a few years they are really great! My favorite, yes they stretch but overtime. They are super stretchy and I see reviews who say that they stretch within 2 weeks, but that's because you tie your hair too tight. At first I do 2 or 3 ties around my hair, then when it's stretches after a couple of months, then I'll tie it 4 times around my ponytail. Honestly they do not break my hair, nor do they give me headaches. I have naturally curly hair, and I flat iron and it's blonde. These elastics are awesome! I buy the small box of 3 and they last me 1 year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am not impressed with these hair ties. They stretch out so much after a couple of uses!! They are starting to fray and come apart as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using these scrunches for a couple years now and while I do keep buying them because I love them they wear/stretch out very fast for the priceu2026 I have much cheaper scrunchies that do not wear/stretch out this fast but but will say they dont have the same gold or quality of material as these ones do. I wear my hair in a pony tail almost daily and buy a new box of 3 probably every 3 months to give you an idea of how fast they stretch out. Wish they would make them better quality to last longer but overall would recommend esp if you dont have thick or long hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been wanting to try this brand for a while now as there has been much talk about it. The scrunchies fall short - the material is exceptionally. However, after 3-4 uses the elasticity of the band wears out. I dont recommend this at all. Its a waste of money for something that is u201ccute.u201d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cute, but lose their elasticity quickly. My hair still tangles and breaks off on the band, so not sure how beneficial they are overall.

reviews.review_title: Worst silk scrunchie on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rip off  15$ sets from Amazon are better quality.  These are thin, stretch out immediately and Im not even convinced theyre real silk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are definitely a splurge, but I love how gentle they are on my hair. I have my hair up in the same bun every day (and when I'm sleeping) and have noticed a dramatic difference in breakage since making the switch. As other reviewers have noted, they do indeed stretch out. I spoke to Slip customer service about this (they are fantastic btw) and was told that this is to avoid creasing the hair. So yes, they are much more delicate than your average elastic and will not last forever. For me, they're worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The black one stretched out after a few uses, which is annoying cuz thats the one I use the most. Doesnt leave any creases, but doesnt hold hair tight for very long. Probably wouldnt but again, but good for sleeping hairstyles at night.

reviews.review_title: I dont get the hype or price.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These stretched out so much that they are now unusable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the actual elastic lasted maybe a month with use a 3-4 times a week. The silk stayed put and was in great condition and was wonderful in my hair, but with wrapping around my hair 2 or 3 wraps, it was stretched out to need 2 more wraps. I hoped for so much more, especially with the price.

Anyone saying they lose their shape just needs to wash them. I wash and dry mine in a lingerie bag and they go back to their original size and shape - and theyre cleanu2026. Only hair ties Ive used for years. Love them for the gym and just running errands.
1. All three of my scrunchies had no u201cSlipu201d sew-tag located anywhere.ud83euddf5  2. Took me 3 twists to complete my beast-look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These actually work! I like them a lot cause it doesnt tug at my hair nor cause any breakage. However the quality is not that good. For the price these should last longer than a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: so cute and soft but they stretch to triple the size after a couple of months unfortunately u2026.

reviews.review_title: Stretches x3 its size overtime, Not worth price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great silk quality, they do not break or tear. HOWEVER, not worth the price. BECAUSE they stretch overtime, the elastic within the silk seems to be of low quality. It stretches almost three times its size, making it so hard to use again. FURTHERMORE, does not have a good grip because the initial size and elasticity it comes in on allows the hair to turn 2-3 times MAX. For someone that has thicker hair, I don't see this working out because of the few turns and volume weighting down the hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these hair bands! I have very thick hair and like to use big silk scrunchies when I workout, however, they dont hold my hair up because I cant get the scrunchie tight enough; however with this product I am able to get the band fairly tight. Wouldnt recommend for marathon runners, but for a normal workout class it does the job and looks cute if you wear hair ties on your wrist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these and continuously repurchase, my only drawback is that I have thick hair and it tends to stretch out within a month of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these scrunches, but they do stretch out pretty fast. But I do like the color selection and the silky feel. They do still leave creases in my hair though, but not as much as a regular hair tie. Theyre easy to remove and dont snag. I just wish they lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mauvaise qualite. Apres 1-2 utilisations lelastique est deju00e0 evente.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Theyre cute and love the material and feels like it protects my hair. However, they lose their elasticity very quickly and doesnt gain it. The reviews were accurate regarding that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love these!! They hold my hair in & dont pull or get tangled ever. Wont wear any other pony tail now. 1 less star because after a year I re buy because they really stretch out.

reviews.review_title: Too much traction/pulls my hair too much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They are well made and hold well however my hair feels like its being pulled with these more than anything I have ever used. Even as a loose low pony to go to bed and I dont even have long hair, it doesnt go past my shoulders. Disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Stretch Out, Not Worth the Price!
reviews.review_text: These are nice for about a week or two. They are a good size for carrying on the wrist but then they stretch out and no longer fit my wrist. They still work as a scrunchie after stretching out a bit but honestly aren't worth the price and I'm pretty disappointed. I enjoy the small scrunchie pack (can't recall brand) I bought from target more than these (and those have not stretched out yet even though I've used them more)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are my favorite scrunchies. Im taking a star off because they do stretch out. I have a lot and very thick and  heavy hair. I will still use the stretched out ones but they do lose a little of the grip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these but they do stretch out more and more over time, which does not seem good for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have had these hair elastics for a while now. I have long thick hair and have never had a hair elastic stretch out on my as fast as these do. Theyre great in the sense that they dont pull your hair and they are comfortable, however I got maybe 2 months out of it before it was stretched out and had to switch to a new one. I will not be repurchasing as theyre expensive and I have gotten longer lasting ones from the dollar store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are my go-to hair elastics. No theyre not cheap, but the quality is great and they dont damage your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like these scrunchies because they held up well, without being too tight or uncomfortable. However, Im knocking off a few points because the whole reason I got them was because they advertise as u201canti-creaseu201d but they still crease my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this scrunchies. They are very cute and gentle for the hair. As every silk scrunchies, they do not hold well the hair for a training for example. I use them to chill around the house and to do some low ponytail. I have very long and thick hair so it does not hold up when I do high ponytails unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: PROS: Ok, these scrunches are my absolute favorite. They do such a good job at not yanking out loads of my hair. They work so well I use them all the time. They are the best scrunches out there.  CON: the biggest issue with these scrunchies, and the reason I knocked it down a star, is they warp very quickly. They stretch out after your first use and slowly get worst with time. Seeing as they are expensive buggers, its an issue for me. If the fixed this I would say best scrunchies ever.

reviews.review_title: Great for hair but stretches out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! My boyfriend's sister put me onto them, and I have noticed less breakage and knots since using them. I'd say my hair is fine and I don't have a lot of it, so one hair tie lasts me a month before it stretches out to double the size. You can still use them stretched out, but it's harder to wear on your wrist and it doesn't hold as well. I'd still recommend this though!

reviews.review_title: No tangles, but don't last long with thick hair.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved that these hair ties don't get tangled and don't cause excessive bumps in my hair.  However, I have thick, heavy hair and the elastic starts to give out within 10 uses or so.  These would be great if the elastic held up a bit better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best scrunchies ever. I give them as gifts and theyre always a hit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love these, great for my hair and are washable. I use them all the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine and thinning hair, and these scrunchies can hold a high/low ponytail without  pulling out hair or causing pain. I can see how these may not hold thicker or a lot of hair because they can be slippery if you don't tie them around your hair tightly (I lost one once).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had these for about a month, they stretched out fairly quickly. For the price, they should last longer. Would not buy again or recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these scrunchies right out of the box. However, they lose their shape so fast. I only use it to hold my bangs up like in the provided pic. That way it wont stretch out too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to buy these with all the reviews stating that they stretch. Ive had these for a while now and have had a lot of usage. I havent experienced any stretching at all. They are amazing. They dont rip out any hairs and are super gentle so they dont leave any dents in the hair. I went and bought the other sizes as well! Definitely recommend these. I just use them gently and dont over twist and pull on them :) I wont use any other hair elastic now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am going to stop wasting my money on these scrunchies. I love the colors and prints but they do get stretched out after the first time I wear them. I do not have a ton of hair so this should not happen and does not happen with cheaper scrunchies I own. For the price I expect better I hope they fix the issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these, I have short hair and these compliment a half up half down look unlike anything else, all without straining my hair. I accidentally put one through the washer, and for anybody that has one that stretched out, doing this made it shrink back to regular size lol. Maybe try that, just in the washer no machine dry. My favourites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved them at the beginning however within I would say 3 months or so the elastic inside gave out and now I have to wrap it 3 or 4 times around just to make it stay in place.   I love the idea of these u201cprotectingu201d your hair but wrapping it 3-4 times around and having it extremely tight is causing breakage. Ill stick with invisible bobble which keep there form and a fraction of the price. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think the ppl leaving poor reviews arent using these correctly.  These scrunchies arent meant to be wrapped tightly around your high pony. Theyre supposed to be used lightly to tie back your hair loosely so that you dont get creasing.   Anyway, theyre performing well for me. I have front bangs and I dont want them in my face while I sleep. I tried pinning them back but then in the morning my hair would be creased and stuck at a weird angle. I tried using regular hair ties and had the same problem. I bought these scrunchies and zero creases! My hair falls back down and makes it so much easier to style.   BUT how come these are listed for $30 but at my Sephora store theyre $27?? Thankfully I picked them up in store!

reviews.review_title: Favorite Scrunchies (wash them and they shrink!)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use these every day and they are the only hair ties I purchase now because they look gorgeous in my hair and on my wrist and they hold very well without leaving harsh creases. As other reviewers have mentioned, they do stretch out. One of mine accidentally slipped into my laundry and after being washed and dried it shockingly shrunk close to its original size! I now do this whenever they start getting too stretched!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these because of the promise of less breakage and more gentle on hair in general. However, I have not seen any less breakage. In fact, these random hairties I picked up at target are so much better than these and are only $5 for a set of 5. These stretch out pretty quickly and yes, you can wash them but its annoying how often youd have to wash them to get them back to normal size. Too expensive and not worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: so stretched out, same as every other review. they are so nice but stretch out almost instantly.... I don't mind wrapping it around my pony tail 4 or 5 times but I can't wear it on my wrist because of how stretched out it is which is honestly the most annoying part

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love these so badu2026.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dont waste your money. These are dollar store quality elastics wrapped in pretty silk. The small pack works out to about $10 per elastic which lasts less than 1 week before its stretched so badly it wont stay on your wrist. I desperately wanted a silk scrunchie to protect from breakage but sadly this girl aint it.

Loved this products for the first few months.... I have naturally curly hair and always straighten my hair and have a hard time finding elastics that don't kink my hair, and this did not..... But after a while it stretched out way too much.

I loved these at firstu2026 but as others have mentioned, and I wish I read before purchase, they stretch out very quickly. The elastic in two of mine have totally lost their shape and are almost unusable after a couple months. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved these hair ties at first. They are super cute, comfortable, and good on wet and dry hair (for me). However, they do not last long term. I bought the 3 pack and 2 are already stretched out and completely losing their shape. Ive had drug store pony tails last much longer. Complete bummer, because they are not cheap enough to only last a month or two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, it stretches out over time, but it is an easy slim scrunchie for avoiding hair breakage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Anyone who doesn't want to have hair breakage NEEDS these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice product, liked the colour and fabric however, they seem to stretch out really quickly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive had these for about a month now and they are holding up pretty well. I have noticed a bit of stretching but thats kind of expected since it is an elastic after all. I use them for running and they hold my hair quite well. I think these are more suited for low ponytails and not for high buns which require more support. In terms of reducing breakage - cant say Ive noticed a difference yet. I would only buy these with a discount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these so much minus their one downfall - they stretch out sooooo much after a couple months of use. I can wrap it around a full extra time now after having this set since Christmas :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love Slip scrunchies so much I ordered 3 of these when I had 15% off to give as birthday and Mothers Day gifts.  They are the only ones I use and definitely noticed no breakage since I started wearing them a couple of years ago.  I have long hair and do have to be careful when my hair is super soft as if not tight enough they can slip off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best scrunchies ever! Glad i decided to purchase this. My hair stylist recommended this to me as I had a lot of breakage to my hair from bleaching my hair. My hair is fine and quite thin near the ends. Ive used one scrunchie everyday for a week now and it hasnt worn out the way I read It would.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these Small Slipsilk Scrunchies!!!! They also look extremely cute on the arm. It's like the best of both worlds of a normal hair tie...and a scrunchy! Keep in mind though your hair will crease with these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initally really loved these. I wear my hair in a low bun everyday for work. These scruchies initally worked really well, but after close to a month of use they have stretched out. I can see it's slowly stretching to the point I won't be able to keep my bun in place eventually. Over the course of the month I have needed to wrap it 2x more to keep my bun in place, and the stretch is almost gone where there is tension and it's hard to make my bun tight. The material is awesome but this product should hold up for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Noticed less hair loss with these. Really worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you don't want a dent in your hair, then this is the hair tie for you.  They never crease your hair.  The tie, could be tighter, and it does stretch out after a period of time, but overall, it does what I intended for it to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For the price of this product youd think it wouldnt stretch out so bad and fast.. I want to love these so bad theyre a great concept however mine are so stretched out now (and havent wont them a bunch) I can barely use them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are great. I have long thick hair and these dont break my hair or leave creases. My boyfriend has long enough hair to put in a little bun and he has been stealing mine because they dont pull his hair out either. Theyre not cheap but well worth it if you dont want your hair to be pulled out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have curly hair and in the last few years Ive gone back to using scrunchies in an effort for less breakage. The regular cloth ones you can get at other stores are good. But as soon as I take my hair down from the ponytail and even a bun, my curls are not in the best shape. I picked these Slipsilk Scrunchies up on a whim while in the checkout aisle. And Im never going back to regular cloth scrunchies. These arent meant for full support, keep your hair up tight, and for a long use hairstyle. These dont tug my hair when I take the silk scrunchie out. 5 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The reviews that say that they stretch are true. However if your just throw them in the washer and dryer they are back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect scrunchies for short, thin, damaged hair. Cute colors and attractive feel. Removing a star only because of price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Slip and I wanted to love these so bad. They're so cute and look so nice in your hair or even worn on the wrist but these things stretch out SO SO bad and FAST! One could maybe last me 3 weeks before it became stretched out and distorted. To the point where I can't even put them on my wrist, let alone my hair (and I do not have thick hair).  Also, when they stretch out they get very curly and wonky looking.   Again, they're beautiful at first and I really wanted to like them but the quality and longevity (especially for the price) are just unacceptable. A $3 scrunchie from Walmart will last longer than one of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These silk scrunchies are really good for the hair to prevent breakage, and I didn't mind paying the price because they appear much cuter on the wrist than an ordinary hairband. Unfortunately they stretch out so large after wear and don't go back to their original size :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

The biggest downside with these is that theyre very expensive for hair-ties. I would recommend getting the 3-pack if youre interested in trying them out before committing to the bigger pack.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Full fine hair, sometimes worn naturally curly/wavy but usually blown out straight. I love these and use them when Ive blown my hair out or straightened it. They dont pull my hair and cause a headache, they dont crease unless you wrap them 3+ times, they hold well when wrapped twice. I have tiny wrists (2u201d across, yes, I just measured), and these are slightly big on me but not overly so. They definitely wont cut circulation off like normal hair ties fresh out of the bag. I feel they stretch out faster than normal hair ties do when used daily, but its still a few months before that happens. You also have to be mindful you dont wrap them more than needed, because that definitely stretches them out faster. When my hair is naturally curly or I dont care if it gets kinked I switch to InvisiBobbles (just as good but will kink) Swapping the two out has prolonged the life of both sets of hair ties. Ive purchased this set twice, and I will continue to do so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So ive been wanting to try these for a while now, but they are very pricey so I held off as long as I could. I finally caved and they arent worth the hype to me, personally. They are pretty big and look funny on my wrist as it slides up and down constantly. I have fine hair, and have to tie it three times for it to stay. When I take my hair down, i still have creases. I looooove Mariana Hewitt, but im slightly disappointed about these hair ties.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I actually like these more than I thought I would - standard hair elastics fall out of my fine hair quickly, and grippy ones or invisibobbles seem to damaging. I wish there was an all black pack, pink and leopard aren't my thing so much but will probably be fine around the house.   I try to not get them wet and only use on dry hair.   I'm expecting the elastic will stretch out after some time (as most do), but will consider opening the seam and threading a new elastic. It would have been cheaper to just buy a piece of silk and sew these but for having them ready made I'm ok with it.

reviews.review_text: I was really skeptical about these and bought them during the VIB sale so I didnt have to pay full price. Well...I can confirm on my exptrenely dry, curly hair that there is NO denting, NO breakage, NO knots, and NO HEADACHES while using these scrunchiesu2014the hype is real! I am forever changed. And they are a cute wrist accessory when my hair is down :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really comfortable hair ties. I have very fine thin hair, I was using the invisibobble before but it always hurt and tugged at my hair when i pulled them out. Traditional hair ties would also hurt when I remove them. This are really gentle on hair and they do not tug or pull my hair out.

reviews.review_title: Best hair product you can own
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are truly exceptional. I pretty much just wear these and the larger slip scrunches only now. I dont ever want to go back to plain hair elastics.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swore I would never splurge on something like this, but I did anyway, and now there is no going back. These look cute on the wrist and feel amazing in my hair. I verrry rarely find a hair or two that has been tugged out by the scrunchie, but I definitely feel that they slide more smoothly on my hair when I pull out my ponytail or bun.I definitely feel like there are less harsh bends or knots in my hair when I use these ties.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I love these despite the price tag. I saw them in the checkout area at Sephora and grabbed them without looking at the price. I was surprised that they were so expensive when I went to pay. Still, I purchased them since they are quite chic for scrunchies. These are cute while on the wrist and in the hair. I love the colors that came in this pack. They do still leave a small crease in my fine hair, but I don't think that would happen with thicker hair (not sure!). Still, they don't crease the hair as bad as a traditional hair elastic. Be careful when washing your hands while they are on your wrist. I got my black one wet and the material seems to have been affected a little. It's not as soft as it originally was.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I read reviews before buying this and was hesitant when I saw customers saying that their scrunchies stretched out significantly. I decided to buy them during the VIB sale and I have worn them everyday since receiving them. I have medium thick medium length hair and I tie my hair up while I sleep in the warmer months. these scrunchies have not stretched out for me even after lots of use and wearing them in my hair all night. they are still in my hair when I wake up, do not leave any kinks, and never pull on my hair. great buy thanks to the recommendation by Samantha Ravandahl on YouTube

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these. I bought them because one of the YouTubers I watch raved about them and now I understand why. I have very fine hair so wearing regular hair ties tugs on my hair too much and pulls out a lot of my hair. These Slipsilk scrunchies don't tug or pull out my hair at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not put use these to put up wet or damp hair!!!!  They will stretch out, lose elasticity and wont go back to the tight scrunch they came in.  Made that mistake with my first pack and was wondering why the heck they just all of s sudden got shapeless and not tight.  That was why.  Also, I read reviews where people have a gripe about them losing elasticity really quick.  You have to remember, these are more for casual going out, running errands and especially lounging around.  Meaning, you shouldnt be trying to choke the life out of your hair when putting it up.  It just wont hold for that.  I have very thick hair, and these small ones work really good for like I said, casual styles.  If you have thick and LONG hair, you will probably benefit more from the big size.  These also wont hold real well for exercise or any such vigorous activities.  Yes, they are audaciously expensive, but I think that if you want to really take care of your hair, theyre worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these!!! I just bought them. Have the receipt and everything for ONLY 20$$!!!  Just last week ...& went to order more for the VIB sale cuz I loved them so much and BAM! 7 dollars more! They chaged the price over night... So I won't be getting them now cuz it feels like I'm getting ripped off again!:( Im sick of this Billion dollar company over charging and penny pinching their loyal customers. Shame on Sephora. I know I'm  not the only one who feels this way cuz j have seen lots of comments and posts. It sucks cuz a girls gotta shop and Sephora has got what we need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are HANDS DOWN THE BEST hair ties I've ever used. These don't pull your hair, don't slip, are super sturdy, and I couldn't recommend them more. Do not hesitate to buy these. I wear these to workout (Run/cycle) and my hair doesn't move so I can focus on my workout and not constantly be adjusting my ponytail/top knot. I wear this to work and my hair stays in a bun all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For the last couple of years I have been using the plastic invisibobbles which I like. However, the small slipsilk scrunchies are waaaay more gentle and less painful to use. I have thick long hair and leaving my hair up for too long tends to hurt my scalp and gives me headaches. These hair ties dont do that. If you are expecting these to hold up solid/secure hair styles, these wont be the best for you, but they are great for lazy buns etc. A lot of people complain about them stretching out but if you have thick hair, eventually all hair ties will become loose over time!

reviews.review_text: Nice on hair but stretches almost double in size and only after a month of using it. It's fine for my hair but I like having an elastic on my wrist and now that it's all stretched I can't. I like it enough to buy another box but it sucks that this is happening. You can see the difference on the photo I posted. On left is new, on the right it's after 1 month of using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love these. I have fine, lightened hair and I was beginning to get so much breakage around the crown of my head from wearing my half buns using those tiny band elastics (stupid of me, I know). Since using these Ive noticed way less hair loss when taking them out and they still keep my ponytails as high as I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are amazing! I never thought there would be much to say about a hair tie, but these really are the best. They don't snag, don't break my hair or get caught when I'm removing them, last through my cardio workouts, and don't cut off circulation when I wear one on my wrist. And of course, they're actually quite pretty! I bought  a small set expecting them to be a gimmick, but I''' be purchasing more when the sale comes around.

reviews.review_text: These are cute but the elastic inside the silk stretches out and won't hold up my thick hair. I just use them for decorative purposes by putting my hair up with a good elastic and wrapping these around that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont have super thin hair nor do I have super coarse. Im asian, and my hair is naturally straight and when I used to tie my hair, the old ties always left my hair with a crease, almost as if Id been wearing a hat all day and it looks very unflattering. However, these silk ties doesnt leave any creases and it also doesnt pull or break my hair like other regular hair ties.  I think part of it is because yes, its not super tight but it holds my hair out of my way when I need it too. But at the same time, its not loosey-goosey either. I love it and its the one hair tie I actually make an effort to not misplace or lose.  Just FYI, in 4 hours my hair doesnt crease. But I sleep with it, it will crease (probably due to my head also putting weight in it overnight) so dont expect to sleep with it on and wake up without creases..
